tool_description: Amazon data scraper is the easiest way to get access to products,prices,sales rank and reviews from Amazon,in JSON format
name: Sappy Amzon Scraper
title: Sappy Amzon Scraper

api_list.name: Get  Amazon Products Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sappy-amzon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/B09G9D8KRQ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sappy-amzon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sappy-amzon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sappy-amzon-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
